name: scrolling-terrain-bg
description: A scrolling terrain background heavily inspired by [this codepen](https://codepen.io/loktar00/pen/uEJKl).

scripts.build: touch src/scrolling-terrain.min.js && uglifyjs src/p5/p5.min.js src/p5/terrain.js src/p5/particle.js src/p5/sketch.js -o src/scrolling-terrain.min.js -c -m
